summary: Baitoo - A salon and barber appointment booking mobile app for Faizabad, India. Two user roles: Salon Owners (manage profiles, services, time slots, bookings) and Customers (discover salons, book appointments, leave reviews). Includes admin panel for management and basic notifications. Target: MVP for 10-20 salons and 100-200 users.
architectural_notes: Mobile app targeting small-town users in Faizabad, India - prioritize simplicity and usability
Two-sided marketplace: Salon Owners and Customers with distinct feature sets
Phone number based authentication required for both user types
Admin panel needed for platform management
Scalable architecture for future expansion beyond MVP
Light theme, clean modern UI design approach

existing_features.title: Implement phone number-based authentication system for both salon owners and customers with signup and login flows
Create salon profile management interface for salon owners to input and edit shop name, address, contact number, and opening hours
Build service management system for salon owners to add, edit, and display services with names and prices in Indian Rupees (e.g., Haircut ₹150, Beard ₹80, Facial ₹500)
Implement time slot management system for salon owners to set and configure available appointment time slots
Create bookings dashboard for salon owners to view all appointments with customer details, service, and time, with ability to mark bookings as completed
Build customer-facing salon discovery page showing list of salons in Faizabad with basic information
Create detailed salon view page displaying complete salon information including services with prices, opening hours, address, and contact number
Implement appointment booking flow for customers to select service, choose available time slot, and confirm booking
Create booking confirmation system that displays confirmation details to customer after successful appointment booking
Build rating and review system allowing customers to submit ratings and written reviews after service completion
Create admin panel interface to view and manage all salons and users in the system
Design and implement a simple, clean, modern mobile-responsive interface with light theme, easy navigation optimized for small-town users with focus on usability
